cast.overview: Taking a break from their dreary lives, close friends Thelma and Louise embark on a short weekend trip that ends in unforeseen incriminating circumstances. As fugitives, both women rediscover the strength of their bond and their newfound resilience.
cast.title: Thelma & Louise

cast.original_title: The Three Burials of Melquiades Estrada
cast.overview: When brash Texas border officer Mike Norton wrongfully kills and buries the friend and ranch hand of Pete Perkins, the latter is reminded of a promise he made to bury his friend, Melquiades Estrada, in his Mexican home town. He kidnaps Norton and exhumes Estrada's corpse, and the odd caravan sets out on horseback for Mexico.
cast.title: The Three Burials of Melquiades Estrada

details.biography: Sonny Carl Davis is an American film and television actor. He has appeared in numerous film and television productions, best known as Cowboy in Pinnell's Last Night at the Alamo and as local Texan explaining his state in Richard Linklater's Bernie.
details.name: Sonny Carl Davis
